officialTitle: Biological Mechanisms of Fatigue in Breast Cancer Survivors
conditions: Breast Cancer, Cancer Survivor, Fatigue, Psychosocial Effects of Cancer and Its Treatment
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Relationship between fatigue severity; protein biomarkers; and measures of activity, sleep, mood, and cognition
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Disease-free breast cancer survivors between 3 months and 2 years after completion of primary treatment
* Recruited from the nurse-led breast cancer follow-up clinic at St George's Hospital

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Sufficient English language skills
* No significant cognitive impairment
* No concurrent severe combined immunodeficiency disease

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* See Disease Characteristics
